code: import{createSelector}from'reselect';var selectShop=function selectShop(state){return state.shop;};export var selectShopItems=createSelector([selectShop],function(shop){return shop.collections;});export var selectCollectionForPreview=createSelector([selectShopItems],function(collections){return collections?Object.keys(collections).map(function(key){return collections[key];}):[];});export var selectCollection=function selectCollection(collectionUrlParams){return createSelector([selectShopItems],function(collections){return collections?collections[collectionUrlParams]:null;});};export var selectIsCollectionFetching=createSelector([selectShop],function(shop){return shop.isFetching;});export var selectIsCollectionLoaded=createSelector([selectShop],function(shop){return!!shop.collections;});
